short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Feel proud & patriotic every time you open a new tab in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TruSearch New Tab Extension: The All-American Browsing Experience

Make Browsing Great Again with the TruSearch New Tab Extension, designed exclusively for Red-blooded Americans. Our extension preserves your patriotic self by infusing the essence of „being American“ into your browsing experience - outlining your pride and conservative principles through features like:

★ Patriotic Quotes ★
Begin each search with a wave of inspiration. Discover powerful quotes from revered Republican leaders and thinkers, celebrating our nation's traditional values and wisdom. These quotes are more than words; they serve as guidance for the true American spirit.

★ Shop American ★
Support our homeland with every purchase. Our curated list of US-based companies ensures your spending stays within the borders, bolstering our economy and honoring the hard work of our fellow Americans.

★ Meme of the Day ★
Lighten up your day with a dash of humor! Click on the blue sidebar button to reveal a daily meme that embodies the American spirit. Whether it's a witty political cartoon or a clever joke about everyday American life, these memes are sure to bring a smile to your face.

★ American Wallpapers ★
Transform your New Tab into a gallery of patriotic imagery. Our selection of US-themed wallpapers celebrates the beauty and ideals of our great nation, reminding us of our heritage and the principles that define us.

Why Add TruSearch To Your Browser?

TruSearch New Tab is more than an extension; it's your gateway to experiencing the web as a true American. It brings you closer to the heart of American thought, culture, and action, ensuring every click reaffirms your values. 

Experience the difference with TruSearch:
• Access to trustworthy news and conservative insights.
• Celebrate American values with every search.
• Support the US economy with guided shopping.

For inquiries and support: trusearchnewtab@gmail.com

Privacy Note: Your privacy and preferences are protected by law and will never be compromised, shared, or sold without your explicit consent.

Review our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:

• Terms of Use: https://trusearchextension.com/privacy-policy.php
